title: Font - Movie credits
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone know the name of the typeface used on this movie credits ?

Thank you for all the help you can provide !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Police_3575.png)

Font: 

 Walbaum 

Solved By: 

 [JanekZ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071417/http:/typophile.com/user/9108 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
Hard to say, sample is blurry and details can't be clearly seen but could be [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071417/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Didot) (Hoefler's [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071417/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/didot/overview)).  
EDIT: Janek's suggestion of Walbaum might probably be a better choice.
It's exactly the one I was looking for. Thank you both for your help.
